name: Stacks
overview: An action game created by Derek for the 2020 C64 4KB Game Coding Competition. Collect a brick from the pile. Once all repairs are completed, run back to the flashing pile. Climb a ladder and use left or right when level with a damaged section of chimney to repair it with the brick. Do all repairs. Watch out for the birds that hill knock you off your ladder. Use the token to scare then off.
